answers.answer: Sounds painful what type of diabetes do you have
I would say it's just normal muscle pain I get pain in my legs ect due to extra water and I don't have diabetes this time round
I am 28 weeks pregnant and am having my 2nd child after 13 years.  It was a shock for all of us.  We are excited now.  Yes a pregnancy pillow is perfect.!!! Good luck

question: I Have Diabetes i got them when i was pregnant with my 2nd born. I have been controlling them but the past three days they have been out of control and i dont know what to do to get them back under control and i have a really bad leg cramps at night...is anyone else going through this and if so what is helping you... I am 29 wks and on my 3rd baby...
title: Dont Know What To Do...So Much Pain
